title: Christmas prune cake
ingredients: ['90g mashed banana', '120g butter, softened', '3 large eggs, beaten', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '300ml water', '450g plain flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/4 teaspoon nutmeg', '1 pinch of salt', '250g chopped prunes']
